generalInfo:
Experience Egypt beyond the usual path; from Cairo’s ancient wonders to the peaceful Oases of Kharga and Dakhla, ending in Luxor’s timeless temples.
This trip combines adventure with local life, staying in eco-lodges, meeting local people, and discovering desert landscapes.
You’ll travel responsibly, support small communities, and help preserve Egypt’s heritage and nature.

Activities:
*Oasis exploration
*Desert safari (optional)
*Cultural visits
*Local food experiences
*Ancient temples & tombs
*Discover the GEM (Grand Egyptian Museum)
*Land of Civilization
*Eco Lodge
*Desert Vibes
*Palm Trees
*Hot Springs (optional)
*Sand Dunes
*Egypt’s Capital
*Countryside Charm
*Simplicity
*Quietness

dayInfo.description: Arrival at Cairo International Airport, meet & assist through formalities, transfer to your hotel, check-in & overnight.
Breakfast, full day to visit Sakkara and the Great Pyramids of Giza & Sphinx. Chance to stop at local stores. Overnight in Cairo.
After breakfast, you will visit the new Grand Egyptian Museum. Return to hotel and overnight.
Early breakfast, then flight to Kharga. Transfer to Qasr El Bagawat Eco-Lodge, dinner & overnight.
After a delicious breakfast, visit Bagawat tombs, Hibis Temple, Kharga Museum, and the Old Market. Dinner & overnight.
After breakfast, Drive to Dakhla Oasis, visit Qasr, Blat, and Mzoka, plus a natural hot spring "if available". Return to Kharga.
Start your day with a delicious breakfast, followed by a visit to Al-Ghawita Temple and relax in the natural hot spring"if available". Dinner & overnight.
Breakfast, check-out, and drive to Luxor. Check-in at hotel and overnight.
After your breakfast, you will visit the West Bank (Valley of the Kings, Hatshepsut Temple, Colossi of Memnon) and the East Bank (Karnak Temples). Overnight in Luxor.
Breakfast, check out, and final departure from Luxor Airport.
